com.supenta.flitchio.sdk

Interface FlitchioStatusListener


  • public interface FlitchioStatusListener
    Listener of FlitchioController lifecycle events, like binding/unbinding, and connection/disconnection of Flitchio. It must be passed in FlitchioController.onCreate(FlitchioStatusListener).
    Since:
    0.6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFlitchioStatusChanged(Status status)
      Called when the status of a FlitchioController has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onFlitchioStatusChanged

        void onFlitchioStatusChanged(Status status)
        Called when the status of a FlitchioController has changed. It is called at every point of the controller lifecycle:
        • After you call FlitchioController.onCreate(FlitchioStatusListener), you'll get a first Status.BINDING callback. Then, the next callback will be Status.BOUND if the binding worked, or Status.BINDING_FAILED if it failed.
        • After the Status.BOUND callback, you will get a callback with the actual connection state of Flitchio: either Status.CONNECTED if Flitchio is connected to the phone, or Status.DISCONNECTED otherwise.
        • At this point, if you got the Status.CONNECTED callback, you can start polling data from Flitchio with FlitchioController.obtainSnapshot(). You will also start getting event callbacks if you have passed a listener to FlitchioController.onResume(FlitchioEventListener).
        • At any point, if the binding fails, you will get a Status.BINDING_FAILED callback. It can happen in the attempt of binding or if the current binding hangs up. You can check the reason of the failure in Status.failureReason: its value is one of the constants in Status.FailingStatus.
        To get all the callbacks, it is crucial to respect the lifecycle of the FlitchioController, with onCreate(), onResume(), onPause() and onDestroy().
        Parameters:
        status - The new connection status: one of the Status constants.
        Since:
        0.7.0
